message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This product not only stands as a testament to quality but also embodies functionality and style. Given its unique features and the craftsmanship involved, I believe it's worth more than its face value. However, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $85. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that could easily fetch higher prices on the market. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. Let me know if you're interested!
